Posts.Content: dani4angels wrote: I have a lump that was bx in nov...results benign...had a second opinion just to make sure since they had so much concern with it...2.2 cm lobulated solid mass...They stated they agreed with pathology and they mass looked smaller now 1.7cm  benign findings,birads 2...dr wanted me back for 6 month check now the report reads...2.2 cmx 0.7 cm x 0.8 cm lobulated mass with califications...concurrent with first sono.....Probable benign birads 3....My confusion is that the mass seems to of grown since last sono back to the size it was with more lobules and now calcs...the report now read PROBABLE BENIGN....where as the second after bx said completely benign.....well which one is it ...can FCC grow.....and have calcs....I have a new app in nov. for my next 6 month   thank you Log in to post a reply
